column4: I'm running Ubuntu 8.10 and I have a Creative X-fi with the official drivers. I have a headset plugged in, and everytime I speak it plays back. Everything I say is replayed to me and everything I play (youtube, music etc) is played back to anyone who I might be talking to (skype) Is there anyway to fix either of these?
try turning down the mic input
im pretty sure if you just turn down the mic in volume properties it will help
